front.title: CMVP approved authentication mechanisms

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: NIST Special Publication (SP) 800-140E replaces the approved authentication mechanism requirements of ISO/IEC 19790 Annex E. As a validation authority, the Cryptographic Module Validation Program (CMVP) may supersede this Annex in its entirety with its own list of approved authentication mechanisms. This document supersedes ISO/IEC 19790 Annex E and ISO/IEC 24759 paragraph 6.17.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
